content: I see https://github.com/dschep/ntfy is integrated in our new panel, we would like to give it a try to use webhooks, anyone here maybe had already tried it?

I'm not sure what you mean by "integrated in our new panel"?

But I've not heard anyone experimenting with it. Zulip should take their "Slack incoming webhook," however.
@Alex Vandiver the integration is part of a hosting panel we have in testing now.
